rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language ('has also been detected').
No moderate verbs paired with scale/impact found.
This segment reports detections in multiple locations but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment reports detections in various states, not capabilities or preparedness.
Reports detection location ('has also been detected in bald eagles in other states including...') using standard verbs.
